about_the_game:
VoidWalker is an exciting psychological game in which you will explore the boundaries of conscious dreams and reality. You are Kyle, a researcher in an underground laboratory, participating in a unique experiment that allows you to extract objects from the dream world into reality. But it's not all that simple: as you immerse yourself in dreams, you'll encounter eerie nightmares and strange phenomena that challenge your perception.

The key objective is to explore dreams, solve puzzles and collect artifacts that will help your team become millionaires. But soon Kyle encounters a mystical creature - Morpheus, the lord of dreams, who is not happy to have his peace disturbed. You will go through nightmares, frightening events and unexpected encounters, where your decisions will influence the outcome of the plot.

As you dive deeper and deeper into dream worlds, you will solve complex problems and seek answers to questions, but be careful: conscious dreams can become a trap, and reality may not be what it seems. Courage and wit are your main allies in this battle of reason and illusion.

Main features:

A gripping plot that combines elements of thriller and psychological horror.

Realized dreams as game mechanics: interact with the world around you and manipulate dreams to achieve goals.

Unique puzzles that alter the perception of reality.

Frightening enemies and characters, such as Morpheus, that challenge your fears.

Influence decisions on the further development of the plot and the final game.

Immerse yourself in the world of VoidWalker and find out where the dream ends and reality begins.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain material inappropriate for all age groups or workplace viewing: scenes of violence, cruelty and adult content

name: VoidWalker: Call of Insomnia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 x64
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 10-series
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 x64
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 9 5900x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 20-series
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

Linguagem imprópria

short_description: Immerse yourself in the world of dreams and discover its secrets, enjoying every moment thanks to photorealistic graphics
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, Bulgarian, Polish, Romanian
*languages with full audio support
